item.title: Simple java program that prints your name
item.dc:creator: @badboy badboy
item.description:
@badboy wrote:

heres a breakdown

public class mynameis

this means any class can access it especially when we work with multiple classes and the mynameis is what the source has to be saved as or you will get compile time errors.

public static void main(String[] args) {

this is basically the main function of the program

String var1 = "badboy";

This is the primitive data that holds the value of badboy

system.out.println("my name is...... " + var1);

this is just what it displays as an output

}
}

closing brackets

hope this helps

item.title: Simple java program that prints your name
item.dc:creator: @badboy badboy
item.description:
@badboy wrote:

k copy n paste this in note pad
and save it as mynameis.java

public class mynameis {
	public static void main(String args[]) {
	String var1 = "badboy";
	System.out.println("my name is ..... " + var1);
	}
}

note where it sez "String var1 = "badboy";" you may change badboy and only badboy to your own name compile and run it will display your name have fun[br][size=1]Posted at: April 20, 2006, 01:07:36 pm[/size][hr]ill post more sample programmes like dis hope fully you will understand it
